tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SalesData (
    sales_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    sales_date DATE,
    sales_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE sales_market_join (
    join_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sale_id INT,
    market_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (sale_id) REFERENCES sales_data(sale_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (market_id) REFERENCES market_data(market_id)
);

CREATE TABLE combined_data (
    combined_id INT,
    sales_id INT,
    market_id INT,
    sales_amount DECIMAL,
    market_name VARCHAR(255)
);
